vclaim: A job listing posted by Tesla in January 2021 described the specialist role as having to “address social media escalations … directed at the CEO,” who at the time of this writing was Elon Musk.
title: Is Tesla Hiring Someone to Handle Complaints Tweeted at Elon Musk?
subtitle: The job listing came after the electric car company dissolved its U.S. press team.
author: Madison Dapcevich
